title: Ermans
body:
History

Origins - The Age of Creation

When the Spirits learned of their planet's innevitable doom, various species were created in an attempt to save the planet. The Ermans were the first of the four races, created by Edrenine. Ultimately they failed to provide what was needed to save the planet due to their apathetic, albeit gentle, nature.

The Age of Races

When Urunine created the race of the Dommahound, the two races instantly clashed due to their conflicting natures. Erman-Dommahound conflict continued throughout The Age of Races until finally the Ermans were victorious. However, they suffered heavy casualities themselves and vowed never to fight again.

The Age of Empires - The Age of Awakening

The Ermans remained in perpetual stagnation for the remainder of the ages. Their cities fell into ruin, and in their apathy and lesser numbers there was no motivation to rebuild them. They submitted their lives to an opium-like drug in their belief that pleasure was the ultimate reason for existence.

Genealogy

Reproduction

Ermans do not reproduce in the same way as their Human and Astanan counterparts, and instead share the same method of reproduction as their Dommahound enemies. An Erman is genetically neither male nor female, but a combination of both, and their perceived gender of masculine or feminine traits merely an expression of their genetic makeup. However, only those whose genes expressed the individual to be a female had the ability to reproduce, yet no form of procreation was required. Via a biological signal involving hormonal balances relating to lower levels of stress - a method designed by Edrenine to encourage harmony and civility within the race - a “female” Erman can only bare offpsring when her body deems it safe to do so. They carry their child for a complete Moon.

Their offspring look very similar their Bearer (the name given to the carrier of the child - the concepts of Mother and Father were unknown), but not identical.

The Three Family Lines

When Edrenine first created the Ermans, he made only three. These were Galalorn, Merdana and Kalorna. Subsequent generations of Ermans named these three the Ivormass, meaning "The Great Leaders".

Location

The Ermans settled in the North-East parts of the Seen Lands. Here they built a number of great cities including the largest, Naustaun. Their lands stretch from the Balmare Range in the West to the far lands to the East on the other side of the Tantovf River.
preface: The Ermans are an immortal race of humanoid created by Edrenine during The Age of Creation. They are completely forgotten by the other races, except for the five surviving Dommahound.
